IX.iii.1.l.3.
s
.
AmeriCorps Program Payments
Do not count as income any of the following types of payments received by participants in an AmeriCorps program under the National and Community Service State grant program:
educational awards
living allowances, and
child-care allowances.
An AmeriCorps program is any program that receives approved AmeriCorps positions or Corporation funds under
42 U.S.C. 12571
.
Reference
:Â  For more information on payments excluded by Federal statutes, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 1.I.11
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
